item.title: Losing what is dear
item.description: The feeling that my unhappiness was coming from me not seeing girls or friends, is because, in reality, I was facing other problems, and in order to release the pressure and tension, I wanted to use the ways I have used so far to deal with stress: Sex, video games, and junk food. Video games are deleted, sex is non-existent, and junk food is heavily suppressed. However, meditation has been growing as an alternative for stress relief.
